column4: hi all, i would like to open a file on my ubuntu, i am trying nano file and it doesn't work, i try vi file.conf but i don't seem to be able to edit the file, what is another command to open and edit a file please like for example services.conf
doesn't work is a worthless error report, if you don't specify the output from it "doesn't work", nobody can help you.
and the rest when i do nano file.conf it says command not found, or even when i do sudo nano file.conf again it says command not found
then you need to install nano. sudo apt-get install nano
